name: The Greediest
description:
It's time for harvest ! 

The wiggling caterpillar is really hungry today ! 

Catch as much apple as possible to feed the little insect ! 

Or play with a friend to see who will catch all the apples !

Commands : 

Player 1 : 

- Movement  : GamePad 1 Joystick OR left / right arrows OR "A" / "D" keys

- Mini Jump : GamePad 1 "A" Button OR "Space" key OR "0" key on keypad 

Player 2: 

- Movement  : GamePad 2 Joystick OR "1" / "3" keys on keypad OR "G" / "J" keys

- Mini Jump : GamePad 2 "A" Button OR "Enter" key 

Entry for [ MiniJam 36 : Nature ] : https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-36-nature/rate/480886

Feel you free to give feedback, advices or comments ! 

Have a good game !
